scripts.ci:deploy-frontend:stage: pnpm install && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run deploy:stage
scripts.ci:deploy-frontend:production: pnpm install && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run deploy:production
scripts.ci:deploy-data-service:stage: pnpm install && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run deploy:stage
scripts.ci:deploy-data-service:production: pnpm install && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run deploy:production
